label:label.xlink:title: In table T20.03, if there’s any cell reported in columns 0020;0030;0090;0100;0120-0220, then columns 0020; 0030; 0090; 0100; 0120; 0130; 0140; 0150; 0160; 0170; 0190; 0200; 0210; 0220 must be reported. This applies for z-axis selection ‘Country sub-region’ and each row in scope 0010;0020
